channel.title: Posts on A Person in Progress
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on A Person in Progress

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Hello! Since my inspirations all have a blog, here I am. My goal here is to collect my thoughts, improve as a communicator, and become more of myself. The novelty of this experiment is going to make things a bit rough, but I am of the belief that that is part of the journey. If anyone reads this, I wish you well on your journey and hope that I can be a positive influence, however small.
